comment: Professor Santoro is an amazing lady. She really cares about her students. Flexible with grading. I took her for AMP KSU 1101. There are several projects but none of them are very difficult. 3 easy presentations. Easy A as long as you do your stuff. You only use the book for the midterm and final which are both online w/o lockdown browser.

Amazing person, and really down to earth. She is very understanding so if you have a problem just let her know and she works something out with you. You don't need the book but you should definitely go to class and do the work. She knows a lot about classes so ask away!

She know how college life and she just want to prepare you for what ahead and tell everything that the campus offers you. Everything that was done in class was reasonable and she grades base on everyone effort ( which make grading take so long). Overall a great teacher to have.
The very BEST professor at KSU. She is also an advisor so she is very helpful. You will learn so much about college from being in her class.

Prof Santoro is the best professor! TAKE HER! She is very helpful! This class is an easy A if you show up and do the work. She gives ample amount of time to do assignments. The book was only needed for two online open book quizzes.

I love Professor Santoro. Being in her class was a breeze. We had assignments and little projects all the time but it didn't seem like a lot because they were spread out across the semester. She is also my advisor and will help you with anything you need.

She is a wonderful teacher. Everything is on D2L, and if you leave this class with anything but an A, you are doing something wrong. The only thing to be aware of is that she takes heavy attendance, and if you miss more than 3 classes, every absence after that your grade goes down a letter grade. But she's super funny and helpful. Would recommend.

Santoro is a really good professor, she is really funny, resourceful, cares about her students, and will do anything to help you out. During the entire semester you have a huge project to work on but she will help you with everything along the way and gives good feedback. Also plays TED talk videos. Book is required but only used for the midterm.

Professor Santoro is literally the best teacher at KSU. She helped me transition from HS to college really easily. She's always there if you need her. She's an easy grader for the most part. She is very lienent and funny! I would highly recommend her. She made the class easier than it already was. TAKE HER!

Santoro is one of the best seminar teachers that you can get. She is extremely helpful with not just her class but all of your classes. She doesn't assign any difficult work at all and actually helps you learn how to get around the college and life in general. If you have the option take her learning community. It'll save your grade so much!

Hannah is fabulous! As a freshman seminar teacher she is very helpful in helping you adjust to college life and is really flexible with assignments. I don't think there was any assignment I was given that she wasn't willing to be flexible with. She responds back to emails almost immediately and is there to help you with anything you need!
